mapper.sql: id AS "id", material_type_id AS "materialTypeId", material_type AS "materialType", material_name AS "materialName", material_sku AS "materialSku", total AS "total", exist_number AS "existNumber", repair_number AS "repairNumber", scrap_number AS "scrapNumber", create_time AS "createTime"
mapper.select:
select
from wms_tool_info where 1 = 1
and id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.id},'%')
and material_type_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.materialTypeId},'%')
and material_type like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.materialType},'%')
and material_name like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.materialName},'%')
and material_sku like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.materialSku},'%')
and total like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.total},'%')
and exist_number like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.existNumber},'%')
and repair_number like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.repairNumber},'%')
and scrap_number like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.scrapNumber},'%')
and create_time like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.createTime},'%')
